channel.title: Client Question
channel.description: [font=times new roman][size=14pt] OK I have been looking through Graham's Hyperion server and A 317 deob client and nowhere can I seem to find a file which contains or handles the properties of the camera, mouse clicking, and tiles. I am still a little confused about all the class 1, class 2, class30_sub2_sub3 kinda files. If anyone could help i would surely appreciate it. Thanks! :) [/size][/font]
